Source.Name: libisoburn
Source.Summary: libisoburn is a frontend for libraries libburn and libisofs
Source.Description: libisoburn is a frontend for libraries libburn and libisofs which enables creation and expansion of ISO-9660 filesystems on all CD/DVD/BD media supported by libburn. This includes media like DVD+RW, which do not support multi-session management on media level and even plain disk files or block devices.
